Question: Litbig.lnc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Litbig.lnc

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

Litbig.lnc introduces the latest XYZ model at CES 2024, featuring a 8K OLED display for stunning visual clarity. The XYZ model is powered by an advanced XYZ processor, offering seamless multitasking and smooth performance. With a sleek and modern design, the XYZ model also includes built-in AI technology for smart home integration. Additionally, it boasts a 120Hz refresh rate for immersive gaming experiences. The XYZ model comes equipped with a range of connectivity options, including HDMI 2.1 and USB-C ports. Furthermore, it supports Dolby Atmos for exceptional audio quality. This flagship TV from Litbig.lnc is set to redefine home entertainment with its cutting-edge features and premium build quality.
Summary_cn:
Litbig.lnc

CES 2024产品亮点：

Litbig.lnc在CES 2024展会上推出了最新的XYZ型号，配备了8K OLED显示屏，提供惊人的视觉清晰度。XYZ型号由先进的XYZ处理器驱动，提供无缝多任务处理和流畅性能。XYZ型号设计时尚现代，还包括内置的人工智能技术，实现智能家居整合。此外，它还具有120Hz刷新率，提供沉浸式的游戏体验。XYZ型号配备了多种连接选项，包括HDMI 2.1和USB-C接口。而且，它支持杜比全景声，提供卓越的音频质量。作为Litbig.lnc的旗舰电视，这款产品将凭借尖端功能和优质工艺重新定义家庭娱乐。
